contexts.context: ...a beautiful wildflower. Its name comes from the fire red <mark>fronds</mark> that protect its golden flower. As pretty as it is,...
...can be found in the swamps of Black Marsh. The <mark>fronds</mark> from this plant are light green and quite delicate. Picking...
...this plant are light green and quite delicate. Picking a <mark>frond</mark> can be very difficult, but once retrieved it can be...
